posts.post_content:
Are authentic T201's paper thin?  I just bought my first one on ebay and was somewhat surprised by the stock.

Thanks!

I would consider T201 cards to be paper thin, perhaps just a little thicker than normal paper.  

This should be posted in the main forum, not BST, to get more responses and perhaps help out other collectors.

Brian

Thanks for the info Brian.
My mistake for posting it on the wrong forum.  I have no idea how to change it though.

Thanks again!

[quote name="brianp-beme" post=1536247]I would consider T201 cards to be paper thin, perhaps just a little thicker than normal paper.  

This should be posted in the main forum, not BST, to get more responses and perhaps help out other collectors.

Brian[/QUOTE]
